text: Timothy P. Riordan (born July 15, 1960) is a former American football quarterback who played one season with the New Orleans Saints of the National Football League. He was drafted by the St. Louis Cardinals in the third round of the 1984 NFL Supplemental Draft. He played college football at Temple University and attended New London High School in New London, Connecticut.
